description: Least k such that number of distinct prime divisors of the numbers in row k of Pascal's triangle is n.
comments: A004788(a(n)) = n and A004788(m) != n for m < a(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 15 2015
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..250
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {irow = 0; while(omega(prod(i=0, irow, binomial(irow, i)))!=n, irow++); return (irow);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 13 2013(Haskell)import Data.List (elemIndex); import Data.Maybe (fromJust)a004789 = fromJust . (`elemIndex` a004788_list)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 15 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
